title: METAtropolis: The Wings We Dare Aspire
description: In a near future Pacific Northwest, the mysterious Tygre Tygre shows up unannounced at the hidden city of Cascadiapolis, and sets events in motion that lead to the destruction of that city-and the ultimate surfacing of an end-game millennium in the making. Who are the shadowy Bull Dancers? What part does the high-powered J. Appleseed Foundation play in their secret work? And how will a legendary security specialist, a dying billionaire, a disgraced cop, a minister who's lost his faith, and a keen-eyed nonprofit accountant work together to prevent what looks suspiciously like ... the end of the world? From the award-winning Audible series, METAtropolis First time in print!Contents:Foreword (METAtropolis: The Wings We Dare Aspire) • essay by Kevin J. AndersonIntroduction (METAtropolis: The Wings We Dare Aspire) • essay by Steve FeldbergIn the Forests of the Night • (2008) • novella by Jay LakeThe Bull Dancers • (2010) • novella by Jay LakeA Symmetry of Serpents and Doves • (2010) • novella by Ken ScholesRock of Ages • (2013) • novella by Jay LakeLet Me Hide Myself in Thee • (2013) • novella by Ken Scholes
author: Jay Lake
